questions.question: This protocol is used to secure communications over a computer network by encrypting data.
This term refers to the process of establishing a secure connection between a client and a server using SSL/TLS.
This type of certificate is used in SSL/TLS to verify the identity of a website and establish a secure connection.
This version of SSL was deprecated due to security vulnerabilities and replaced by TLS.
This term refers to the practice of using SSL/TLS to encrypt data transmitted between a web browser and a web server.
